text: is a male Japanese voice actor from Fukuoka, Japan who is an affiliate of Mausu Promotion. ==Personal life== In 1996 he enrolled at Ezaki Production school. Since 1998, he has been affiliated with Mausu Promotion. He has admitted that he has been a heavy smoker since high school, but as of 2014 he has quit smoking. He has been married to fellow voice actress Junko Takeuchi since 2006 with whom he has one child. ==Filmography== ===Television animation=== ;1998 *Fancy Lala – Nishiyama ;1999 *Devil Lady – Arito *Dual!
